short_summary: Request for Proposal for Enhanced Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR)
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement: Enhanced Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR)**

**English Title:** W4948-24SE12B Enhanced Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR)
**French Title:** W4948-24SE12B Capacité améliorée de renseignement, de surveillance et de reconnaissance (RSR)

**Reference Number:** WS4074921574-Doc4083867883
**Solicitation Number:** WS4074921574

**Close Date:** August 16, 2023 2:00 PM EDT

**Status:** [Cancelled]

This request for proposal (RFP) is cancelled and no further action is required.

**Context:** The Department of National Defence (DND) requires services for category 3 or subcategory 3.1 as part of a larger contract.

**Bidder Requirements:**

* Suppliers must be registered under the Supply Arrangement # W6399-21J415
* Interested suppliers can obtain the Supply Arrangement by downloading it from [CanadaBuys - Collective Military Training role players and facilities](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/supplyarrangement-establishment Alien. Talent96614).

**Proposal Requirements:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 4, 2023 by 2:00 PM EDT.
* Only suppliers who are qualified under the Supply Arrangement # W6399-21J415 may submit a bid.
* Suppliers are responsible for ensuring that all bid submissions meet the specified requirements.

**Postponement:**

Pursuant to amended regulations, this RFP will not be extended to provide additional time for suppliers to qualify and submit proposals.

**Contracting Party:**

* Procuring Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada

**Contact:**

Please contact Shamael Malko-Moore (SPAC/PSPC) at:
Phone: None
Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for additional information.
